amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $80 million for the Kinetic Energy Interceptor program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 111-233 to strike $80 million for the Kinetic Energy Interceptor program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 307 (Roll no. 663).
